property.name: SELECTED_ENTRY
property.shortdesc: Capitalizes the specified topic but does not capitalize its nested topics. Valid only as parameter of the topic capitalize method; cannot be used as a parameter of the index capitalize method. Note: Must occur after the specified topic and its nested topics are created.

property.name: INCLUDE_SUBENTRIES
property.shortdesc: Capitalizes the specified topic and its nested topics. Valid only as parameter of the topic capitalize method; cannot be used as a parameter of the index capitalize method. Note: Must occur after the selected topic and its nested subtopics are created.

property.name: ALL_LEVEL_1_ENTRIES
property.shortdesc: Capitalizes all level 1 entries. Note: Capitalizes only topics created before the capitalization statement appears in the script.

property.name: ALL_ENTRIES
property.shortdesc: Capitalizes all index entries. Note: Capitalizes only topics created before the capitalization statement appears in the script.
